availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William M. Rowsey Lane (Anderson County farm laborer)

body.p: Residence: Lawrenceburg, Anderson County, Kentucky. A Kentucky-born farm laborer, son of John R. and Catharine Lane.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, Lawrenceburg post office, p. 99.

Find A Grave, Entry for William Rowsey Lane (1844-1920), Find A Grave Memorial # 174647515, Versaille Cemetery, Versailles, Woodford County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=lane&GSfn=william&GSby=1844&GSbyrel=in&GSdy=1920&GSdyrel=in&GSob=n&GRid=174647515&df=all& (accessed 6 Jul 2017).
